who_am_i.title: Who am I?
who_am_i.p2: A web designer and React developer who pursues creative freedom, enjoying the infusion of minimalist aesthetics and dynamic effects in interfaces.
who_am_i.p3: I hold a critical view of the education system, believing in the value of creativity and independent thinking. I hope to break through existing frameworks to create more space for self-directed exploration for the next generation.
who_am_i.p4: I aspire to find a balance between work and life, integrating my interests into my daily life to realize my sense of self-worth.
